title: Niagara Falls, New York
summary: Niagara Falls is a city in Niagara County, New York, United States. As of the 2020 census, the city had a total population of 48,671.[3] It is adjacent to the Niagara River, across from the city of Niagara Falls, Ontario, and named after the famed Niagara Falls which they share.
